label: specifiedPlot
comment: A crop plot specified for this agricultural application.
A crop plot specified for this agricultural zone area.

rangeIncludes.comment: A small piece of land or water used for a crop such as an agricultural or aquacultural crop.

domainIncludes.comment: Any substance such as seed, fertilizer, water, gas or chemical applied to an agricultural field, substrate, construction, plant, animal or product.
A named, delimited and identified part of a land and or water surface of the globe subject to dedicated uniform agricultural treatment.
